document_data.name: Cage
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cage''' was a special prison located within the complex of the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Cage was completely enclosed by ''[[wall of force|walls of force]]''. Powerful enchantments were in place to ensure that spellcasting, or the use of magical abilities, was not possible within the Cage.
document_data.Activities: This enchanted prison was used to house dangerous mages, priests, and [[genie]]s. Due to the powerful enchantments warding the Cage, the [[Grand Caliph]] could safely question anyone held within. Still, he was always accompanied by an escort of the [[Dutiful Mamluk Society|Dutiful]], a [[sha'ir]], and several genies.
